data.eml:eml: A new species of Microsphecodes from Jamaica (Hymenoptera, Halictidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Engel, Michael S. (2011): A new species of Microsphecodes from Jamaica (Hymenoptera, Halictidae). ZooKeys 111: 33-40, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.111.1597, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.111.1597
